examples.example: 公司新购置的扫描仪极大地提高了办公效率。

translate.english: The newly purchased scanner of the company has greatly improved office efficiency.

examples.example: 那台先进的扫描仪让我们的文件处理工作变得更加高效便捷。

translate.english: That advanced scanner makes our document processing work more efficient and convenient.

examples.example: 我用扫描仪将珍贵的照片扫描下来，以便更好地保存和分享。

translate.english: I use the scanner to scan the precious photos down so as to better preserve and share.
